sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD , NNF_CL_CD , CHILD , TXPR_NM , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN , BSC_DDC_CL_CD , WMN_DDC_CL_CD , SNPRNT_FMLY_DDC_CL_CD , SCC_DDC_CL_CD , DSBR_DDC_CL_CD , CHBT_ATPR_DDC_CL_CD , AGE6_LT , SCHOOL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #suptFmlyRltClCd# , #nnfClCd# , #child# , #txprNm# , #txprDscmNoCntn# , #bscDdcClCd# , #wmnDdcClCd# , #snprntFmlyDdcClCd# , #sccDdcClCd# , #dsbrDdcClCd# , #chbtAtprDdcClCd# , #age6Lt# , #schoolYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167020 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD=#suptFmlyRltClCd# , NNF_CL_CD=#nnfClCd# , CHILD=#child# , TXPR_NM=#txprNm# , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN=#txprDscmNoCntn# , BSC_DDC_CL_CD=#bscDdcClCd# , WMN_DDC_CL_CD=#wmnDdcClCd# , SNPRNT_FMLY_DDC_CL_CD=#snprntFmlyDdcClCd# , SCC_DDC_CL_CD=#sccDdcClCd# , DSBR_DDC_CL_CD=#dsbrDdcClCd# , CHBT_ATPR_DDC_CL_CD=#chbtAtprDdcClCd# , AGE6_LT=#age6Lt# , SCHOOL_YN=#schoolYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD , NNF_CL_CD , CHILD , TXPR_NM , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN , BSC_DDC_CL_CD , WMN_DDC_CL_CD , SNPRNT_FMLY_DDC_CL_CD , SCC_DDC_CL_CD , DSBR_DDC_CL_CD , CHBT_ATPR_DDC_CL_CD , AGE6_LT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD , NNF_CL_CD , CHILD , TXPR_NM , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN , BSC_DDC_CL_CD , WMN_DDC_CL_CD , SNPRNT_FMLY_DDC_CL_CD , SCC_DDC_CL_CD , DSBR_DDC_CL_CD , CHBT_ATPR_DDC_CL_CD , AGE6_LT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
